GK20hpriydau:1612: yāvat pratīpam āgacchāmi tāvat kair api tat sthānaṃ saha Vindhyaketunā smartavyatāṃ nītam
GK20hpriydau:1615: kañcukī - tatra cānviṣyatā mayā na prāptā |
GK20hpriydau:1616: tadā-prabhṛti nādyāpi vijñāyate kva vartata iti |

GK20hpriydau:1624: Manoramā - ṇa hu ahaṃ Piadaṃsaṇā-uttantaṃ jāṇāmi |
GK20hpriydau:1626: vvavadeseṇa āṇīdaṃ visaṃ pāia pāṇa-saṃsae vaṭṭadi tti evvaṃ mae ṇivedidaṃ |
GK20hpriydau:1629: eṣā khalv Āraṇyikā kalya-vyapadeśenānītaṃ viṣaṃ pītvā prāṇa-saṃśaye
GK20hpriydau:1637: tā edaṃ ettha juttaṃ (prakāśam sa-saṃbhramam |)| Maṇorame lahu iha evva āṇehi taṃ |
GK20hpriydau:1652: Āraṇyikā - halā Maṇorame kīsa dāṇiṃ maṃ andhaāraṃ pavesesi |
GK20hpriydau:1653: halā Manorame kasmād idānīṃ mām andhakāraṃ praveśayasi |
GK20hpriydau:1657: (Vāsavadattāṃ dṛṣṭvā |) bhaṭṭini lahu parittāehi lahu parittāehi |
GK20hpriydau:1664: Vāsavadattā - (sa-saṃbhramaṃ rājānaṃ haste gṛhītvā |) ajja-utta uṭṭhehi uṭṭhehi |
GK20hpriydau:1669: kañcukī - (vilokya |) su-sadṛśī khalv iyaṃ mama rāja-putryāḥ
GK20hpriydau:1680: (iti nipatya bhūmāv utthāya |) rāja-putri iyaṃ sā Priyadarśikā bhaginī te |
GK20hpriydau:1688: saṃjāta-sāndra-makaranda-rasāṃ krameṇa pātuṃ gataś ca kalikāṃ kamalasya bhṛṅgaḥ /
GK20hpriydau:1689: dagdhā nipatya sahasaiva himena cāsau vāme vidhau na hi phalanty abhivāñchitāni // HPri_4.8
GK20hpriydau:1690: Manorame pṛcchyatāṃ tāvat kiṃ te bodha iti |
GK20hpriydau:1695: (sāsraṃ punaś cālayantī) sakhi nanu bhaṇāmi kiṃ te bodha iti |]
GK20hpriydau:1696: Priyadarśikā - (a-vispaṣṭam |) jaṃ edaṃ avasthānaṃ (sic) gadāe vi mae ṇa
GK20hpriydau:1698: [yad etad avasthāyāpi mayā na mahā-rājo dṛṣṭaḥ |]
GK20hpriydau:1702: eṣā mīlayatīdam īkṣaṇa-yugaṃ jātā mamāndhā diśaḥ
GK20hpriydau:1703: kaṇṭho 'syāḥ pratirudhyate mama giro niryānti kṛcchrād imāḥ /
GK20hpriydau:1704: etasyāḥ śvasitaṃ hṛtaṃ mama tanur niśceṣṭatām āgatā manye 'syā viṣa-vega eva hi paraṃ sarve tu duḥkhaṃ mama // HPri_4.9 //
GK20hpriydau:1709: kiṃ dāṇiṃ mae avarajjhaṃ aāṇantīe jeṇa kuvidā ṇālavasi |
GK20hpriydau:1713: (ūrdhvam avalokya) hā devva hadaa kiṃ dāṇiṃ mae avakidaṃ jeṇa edāvatthaṃ gadā me bhaiṇī ādaṃsidā
GK20hpriydau:1717: kim idānīṃ mayāparāddhaṃ ajānatyā yena kupitā nālapasi |
GK20hpriydau:1722: kim idānīṃ mayāpakṛtaṃ yenaitad avasthāṃ gatā me bhaginyādarśitā |]
GK20hpriydau:1724: vidūṣakaḥ - bho vaassa kahaṃ tumaṃ mūḍho via ciṭṭhasi |
GK20hpriydau:1729: vayasya kathaṃ tvaṃ mūḍha iva tiṣṭhasi |
GK20hpriydau:1740: (rājopasṛtya Priyadarśanāyā upari hastaṃ nidhāya mantra-smaraṇaṃ nāṭayati
GK20hpriydau:1742: Vāsavadattā - ajja-utta diṭṭhiā paccujjīvidā me bhaiṇī |
GK20hpriydau:1748: Priyadarśikā - (śanair utthāyopaviśya ca jṛmbhikāṃ nāṭayantī sa-viṣādam
GK20hpriydau:1749: a-vispaṣṭam |) Maṇorame ciraṃ khu sutta mhi |
GK20hpriydau:1751: vidūṣakaḥ - bho vaassa ṇivvūḍhaṃ de vedittaṇaṃ |
GK20hpriydau:1753: (Priyadarśikā sābhilāṣaṃ rājānaṃ nirūpya sa-lajjaṃ kiṃcid adho-mukhī
GK20hpriydau:1756: kiṃ dāṇiṃ vi esā aṇṇah'; evva karedi |
GK20hpriydau:1759: svabhāva-sthā dṛṣṭir na bhavati giro nāti viśadās
GK20hpriydau:1762: tathā nādyāpy asyā niyatam akhilaṃ śāmyati viṣam // HPri_4.10 //
GK20hpriydau:1763: kañcukī - (Priyadarśikāṃ nirdiśya |) rāja-putri eṣa te pitur ājñā-karaḥ |
GK20hpriydau:1773: Vatsa-rāja-prabhāvāt punas tad avastham eva rājyam |
GK20hpriydau:1775: dāṇiṃ vi dāva bhaiṇiā siṇehaṃ daṃsehi |
GK20hpriydau:1778: idānīm api tāvad bhaginī snehaṃ darśaya |
GK20hpriydau:1781: vidūṣakaḥ - hodi tumaṃ bhaiṇiṃ geṇhia kaṇṭhe evvaṃ parituṭṭhā si |
GK20hpriydau:1783: [bhavati tvaṃ bhaginīṃ gṛhītvā kaṇṭha evaṃ parituṣṭāsi |
GK20hpriydau:1787: vidūṣakaḥ - (rājānaṃ nirdiśya sa-smitam |) vodia pasārehi hatthaṃ |
GK20hpriydau:1804: (Vāsavadattā rājño hastaṃ balād ākṛṣya Priyadarśikām arpayati |)
GK20hpriydau:1807: Vāsavadattā - ajja-utta ado vi paraṃ kiṃ de piaṃ karīadu |
GK20hpriydau:1812: niḥśeṣaṃ Dṛḍhavarmaṇā punar api svaṃ rājyam adhyāsitaṃ tvaṃ kopena su-dūram apy apahṛtā sadyaḥ prasannā mama /
GK20hpriydau:1813: jīvantī Priyadarśanā ca bhaginī bhūyas tvayā saṅgatā kiṃ tat syād aparaṃ priyaṃ priyatame yat sāmprataṃ prārthyate // HPri_4.11
GK20hpriydau:1817: urvīm uddāma-sasyāṃ janayatu visṛjan Vāsavo vṛṣṭim iṣṭām iṣṭais traiviṣṭapānām vidadhatu vidhivat prīṇanaṃ vipra-mukhyāḥ /
GK20hpriydau:1818: ākalpāntaṃ ca bhūyāt sthira-samupacitā saṃgatiḥ saj-janānāṃ
GK20hpriydau:1819: niḥśeṣaṃ yāntu śāntiṃ piśuna-jana-giro duḥsahā vajra-lepāḥ // HPri_4.12 //
